name: TKTokenDriverDelegate
desc: The interface that a token driver delegate implements to respond to token creation events.

items.name: func tokenDriver(TKTokenDriver, terminateToken: TKToken)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to terminate the token you specify.

items.name: func tokenDriver(TKTokenDriver, tokenFor: TKToken.Configuration) -> TKToken
items.desc: Creates a new token for the configuration you specify.
